一次又一次啊：
UTF-8:
111001001011100010000000 111001101010110010100001 111001011000111110001000 111001001011100010000000 111001101010110010100001 111001011001010110001010

once and once again:
ASCII:
01101111 01101110 01100011 01100101 00100000 01100001 01101110 01100100 00100000 01101111 01101110 01100011 01100101 00100000 01100001 01100111 01100001 01101001 01101110
